title: Rebecca
description: --- Amazon Paperback Edition ---After centuries of misery under the manipulative thumb of her vampire 'father' Dominic, Rebecca seduces and turns an outsider in a desperate bid to escape her small dysfunctional immortal family. In the blood soaked days that follow she learns how strong the bonds of family can be. A twisted fantasy of terror, erotic desires and decadent hunger, and maybe even true love at the end of it all
author: Mike Vavrinak
